dialogue.text: hi , how are you ? do you have any brothers or sisters ?
yes , i’m 13 and i’ve an older brother .
that’s nice what kind of music do you like
i do not have much time as i play soccer . you ?
i am a music producer for rap artists
cool i like rap . i hate maths though ! do you have other hobbies

turn_0.gold_reference: I would love to join you for a meal! And in return I'll invite you to my future office at the top of the tallest building in the world!
